title: Exuberus Teen Night
short_description: Jump-start your summer with Exuberus, the museum's free annual teen night! Open to Chicago high school teens, this four-hour party features food, dancing with music run by teen DJs, an open stage to show off your talents, teen-led interactive tours and gallery activities, art making, and more.
list_description: The museum's free annual teen night features food, dancing, open mike performances, and more.
description:
Jump-start your summer with Exuberus, the museum's free annual teen night! Open to Chicago high school teens, this four-hour party features food, dancing with music run by teen DJs, an open stage to show off your talents, teen-led interactive tours and gallery activities, art making, and more.

Exuberus is conceived and organized by the Art Institute's Teen Council interns to highlight teen creativity and art.
